name: [Prototype] Rogue Cards
description:
[Prototype] Rogue Cards

Protoype for a card based roguelike.

Instructions
Use your mouse to select a hero, then select a monster to attack. Click ?-tiles to reveal the next monster. If all of you heros are dead the monster will deal damage to you. Survive as long as possible.

@Tinytouchtales | Tinytouchtales.com
